org.project.osman.process

Class OsmanReadability

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.project.osman.process.OsmanReadability

  • public class OsmanReadability
extends Object
    Entry class of the OSMAN Readability package for computing Readability Metrics for Arabic text.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mahmoud El-Haj dr.melhaj@gmail.com

      double calculateOsman(String text)
      Computes OSMAN readability metric for Arabic text (if text has no diacritics please use addTashkeel() before calling the method.
      int countSentences(String text)
      count number of sentences a) using simpler sentence splitter or b) using Stanford tokenizer (Sentence Splitter) you need to uncomment the code below and include the import statements.
      void loadData()
      loadData loads the Arabic dictionaries needed by Stanford tekonizer and sentence splitter.

      • calculateOsman

        public double calculateOsman(String text)

      • addTashkeel

        public String addTashkeel(String text)
                   throws InterruptedException,
                          IOException
        add diacritics (Tashkeel) to Arabic text. This call Mishkal (which needs to be copied to the project's directory.
        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:
        diacriticised text as string
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        IOException

      • countSentences

        public int countSentences(String text)
        count number of sentences a) using simpler sentence splitter or b) using Stanford tokenizer (Sentence Splitter) you need to uncomment the code below and include the import statements. a) might not work if all your text is on one line, I recommend you use Stanford sentence splitter instead or your own delimiters.
        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:
        diacriticised text as string
